title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list, copy, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; fetch-based with full TypeScript definitions.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM, chat, or embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; manage models, chats, documents, and users in one place.

title: ollama-hack
summary: Community showcase of 40+ hackathon projects: Discord bots, Raycast plugins, VS Code extensions, etc.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp for retrieval augmented generation.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement via VS Code extension.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, chat history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing a typed JS client for Ollama; 60 kB, zero dependencies.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package: lightweight wrapper over Ollama REST API with sync/async support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Spring Boot starter and reactive wrappers included.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with tokio, strong typing, and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model to your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local LLMs powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds an Ollama sidebar for AI-assisted note writing and summarization.

title: ollama-raycast
summary: Raycast extension to query Ollama models from macOS spotlight-like launcher.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spins up Ollama containers to run LLM-based tests.
